senses.sense_definition: Describing a facial expression, image, or remark that involves winking or suggests a hidden meaning, joke, or flirtation.

examples.text: She added a <w>winky</w> face to the text to show she was just teasing.
The author included several <w>winky</w> references to his previous novels that only fans would notice.

senses.sense_definition: An emoticon or symbol representing a winking face, used in digital communication to indicate humor, irony, or flirtation.

examples.text: He replied to her message with a simple <w>winky</w>.
I was not sure if the <w>winky</w> meant he was joking or being serious.

senses.sense_definition: A childish or slang term for the penis.

examples.text: The toddler pointed and giggled, calling it his <w>winky</w>.
He was in pain after he accidentally caught his <w>winky</w> in the zipper of his jeans.
